content:
Hello friends. Need help with information.
Is it possible to make the setting so that clients can access external servers Giphy through on-premise zulip server if the Internet is isolated for them?
@SiS not if you truly want to be isolated.
(Since Giphy isn't something you can self-host or whatever)
If you're willing to open a firewall hole such that your users can reach Giphy, then you can likely use the integration with that, but it seems counter to the goal of having isolated Internet.
